  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<ModifyDnResponse,​ModifyDnResponse>, Freezable, ReferralResultHandler<ModifyDnResponse>
    public class FollowModifyDnReferralHandler
extends AbstractFollowReferralHandler<ModifyDnRequest,​ModifyDnResponse>
implements ReferralResultHandler<ModifyDnResponse>
    Provides handling of an ldap referral for modify dn operations.
